message: Hello Bob, I have an amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $180 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $210.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $190 for it.
I'm trying to find a sweet spot for both of us, Bob. I can do $200, but I think that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $185 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $195, but that's as low as I can go. I'm really hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $195. I'd be willing to pay $185 for it.
